02H.F.summary: Hexatronic Group AB (publ), together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, markets, and sells fiber optic communication solutions in Sweden and internationally. The company supplies passive infrastructure for telecom companies; and provides components and system solutions. It also offers fiber optic cables, ducts, copper cables, and network accessories; high tech products for fiber optic communications; fiber optic solutions, such as prefabricated ODFs, multi-fiber cable assemblies, and industrial applications; and training services for telecommunications, electric/gas, and health/safety markets. In addition, the company provides high density polyethylene pipes for communication, power, fiber-to-the-home, ITS, CATV, geothermal, and industrial pressure pipe applications; develops and certificates programs for various industries; and apprenticeships and specialist training programs, as well as distributes fiber optic fusion splicing and measuring equipment. It serves telecom companies and operators, communications, defense and mining industries, and network owners. Hexatronic Group AB (publ) was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden.

1G2.F.summary: GomSpace Group AB (publ), through its subsidiaries, designs, develops, integrates, and manufactures nanosatellites for the academic, defense, government, and commercial markets. It offers mission payloads in the areas of software defined radio, aircraft tracking, ship tracking, ADS-B patch antenna, and optical earth observation; and power and communication systems, command and data handling products, and attitude and orbit control systems, as well as ground systems and various ready to integrate structures. The company's products are used in global tracking, Internet of things, communication, defense and security, remote sensing, and science mission applications. It operates in Denmark, Sweden, Europe, the United States, Asia, and internationally. The company was formerly known as GS Sweden AB and changed its name to GomSpace Group AB (publ) in June 2017. GomSpace Group AB (publ) was founded in 2007 and is based in Uppsala, Sweden.

2I4.F.summary: TagMaster AB (publ), a technology company, develops and sells advanced sensor systems and solutions based on radio, radar, magnetic and camera technologies under the TagMaster, CitySync, Balogh, CA Traffic, Magsys, Hikob, and Sensys Networks brand names. The company develops and markets radio frequency identification products for traffic and rail applications; and automatic number plate recognition products. Its products are used in parking and access control, security, traffic, tolling, airport, mining and port, and fleet operation areas. The company exports its products primarily to Europe, the Middle East, Asia, and North America through a network of partners, and systems integrators. TagMaster AB (publ) was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Kista, Sweden.

86M.F.summary: InCoax Networks AB (publ) provides networking products and solutions to telecom and broadband, and hospitality sectors. It offers modems; in:xtnd Access for the implementation, control, and monitoring of coaxial link conditions; and in:xtnd Manage, an advanced network management system. The company also provides control units under in:xtnd Control name, and frequency combiners under in:xtnd Combine name. InCoax Networks AB (publ)was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in GÃ¤vle, Sweden.

ALCA.ST.summary: Alcadon Group AB (publ) engages in the data and telecommunications business in Sweden. The company offers passive products, including installation materials, such as fiber and copper cables, sockets, and connectors; testing tools and instruments; and active products, which consist of switches, converters, SFP/XPFs, and wireless products, as well as technical support and training services. It also provides commercial real estate networks, such as structured cable systems for offices, industries, and municipal/county councils; MPO systems for data centers, server halls, and co-location; and active communication equipment comprising switches, routers, and wireless. In addition, the company's residential networks include new and ROT production, communication solutions for home, and solutions for electricity. Further, it offers fiber net/FTTx comprising area and urban networks for the railway, energy companies, municipalities, and cities; broadband networks for communities, bylaws, and associations; and act as network operator for ISPs and telecommunication operators. Additionally, the company provides network design, troubleshooting, fiber welds, and rental services, as well as measuring instrument copper/fiber and blow fiber equipment. It distributes and wholesales its products to system integrators, and companies that own or operate data and telecommunication networks. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

DORO.ST.summary: Doro AB (publ), a technology company, develops products and services for seniors. It offers easy-to-use mobile and smart phones, home telephones, and accessories; corded phones and cordless models; stationary and mobile social alarms, digital social alarms, GPS-alarms, and telecare solutions; and products for remote supervision and monitoring. The company also provides end-to-end digital alarm chain services. It sells its products in approximately 28 countries primarily through a network of telecom operators, distributors, specialists, and dealers. The company serves public actors, civil society, and private companies. Doro AB (publ) was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in MalmÃ¶, Sweden.

DR8A.F.summary: Doro AB (publ), a technology company, develops products and services for seniors. It offers easy-to-use mobile and smart phones, home telephones, and accessories; corded phones and cordless models; stationary and mobile social alarms, digital social alarms, GPS-alarms, and telecare solutions; and products for remote supervision and monitoring. The company also provides end-to-end digital alarm chain services. It sells its products in approximately 28 countries primarily through a network of telecom operators, distributors, specialists, and dealers. The company serves public actors, civil society, and private companies. Doro AB (publ) was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in MalmÃ¶, Sweden.

ERCA.DE.summary: Telefonaktiebolaget LM Ericsson (publ), together with its subsidiaries, provides communication infrastructure, services, and software solutions to the telecom and other sectors. It operates through four segments: Networks, Digital Services, Managed Services, and Emerging Business and Other. The Networks segment offers hardware, software, and related services for radio access and transport, as well as related services, such as design, tuning, network rollout, and customer support. The Digital Services segment provides products and services for operators in the areas of business support systems, operations support systems, cloud core, cloud communication, and cloud infrastructure, as well as consulting, learning, and testing services. The Managed Services segment offers networks and IT managed, network design and optimization, and application development and maintenance services to operators. The Emerging Business and Other segment consists of emerging businesses, including Internet of Things; iconectiv; Cradlepoint that provides wireless edge WAN 4G and 5G enterprise solutions; and Red Bee Media, MediaKind, and other new businesses. It operates in North America, Europe and Latin America, the Middle East and Africa, South East Asia, Oceania, India, North East Asia, and internationally. Telefonaktiebolaget LM Ericsson (publ) was founded in 1876 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

GAPW-B.ST.summary: Gapwaves AB (publ) provides wireless communication products. It offers antennas for base stations, microwave radios, automotive radars, and space communications, as well as flange adapters. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden.

GOMX.ST.summary: GomSpace Group AB (publ), through its subsidiaries, designs, develops, integrates, and manufactures nanosatellites for the academic, defense, government, and commercial markets. It offers mission payloads in the areas of software defined radio, aircraft tracking, ship tracking, ADS-B patch antenna, and optical earth observation; and power and communication systems, command and data handling products, and attitude and orbit control systems, as well as ground systems and various ready to integrate structures. The company's products are used in global tracking, Internet of things, communication, defense and security, remote sensing, and science mission applications. It operates in Denmark, Sweden, Europe, the United States, Asia, and internationally. The company was formerly known as GS Sweden AB and changed its name to GomSpace Group AB (publ) in June 2017. GomSpace Group AB (publ) was founded in 2007 and is based in Uppsala, Sweden.

GW3.F.summary: Gapwaves AB (publ) provides wireless communication products. It offers antennas for base stations, microwave radios, automotive radars, and space communications, as well as flange adapters. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden.

HDW-B.ST.long_name: Hitech & Development Wireless Sweden Holding AB (publ)
HDW-B.ST.summary: Hitech & Development Wireless Sweden Holding AB (publ) supplies technology and services within Internet of Things (IoT) and real-time positioning in Sweden. The company develops and supplies solutions for digitalization and optimization of industry physical processes by griffin enterprise positioning (GEPS) service built in artificial intelligence. It offers enterprise real time location services in the industrial IoT market; and GEPS, a solution that bridges the information gap between physical assets and business systems for asset management, fleet management, production logistics, staff safety, hospitality, and healthcare applications. The company also provides connectivity modules, such as dual band and mode Wi-Fi and Bluetooth modules, and Wi-Fi systems used in the automotive infotainment, wearables, healthcare, industrial, smart buildings, and connected homes for IoT and industrial and digital media markets. In addition, it offers RF-antenna and matching, FCC/CE certification, production test reference design, and long-term conservation services of electronic components, as well as RF module development services. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Kista, Sweden.

HMS.ST.summary: HMS Networks AB (publ) provides industrial communication and industrial Internet of Things solutions under the Anybus, eWON, IXXAT, and Intesis brands worldwide. The company offers Anybus Embedded network cards, which are embedded into the customer's product to provide network connectivity; Anybus Gateways for communication between industrial networks; Anybus Wireless that enables to connect networks, machines, and devices over Bluetooth, WLAN, or cellular networks; and Anybus Edge, which enables to connect industrial devices to the Internet. It also provides Ewon Cosy, which provides users with a secure tunnel for remote maintenance and troubleshooting; Ewon Flexy, an industrial router and IIoT gateways for remote access and data services, such as remote surveillance and information gathering; and Ewon Talk2M, an industrial cloud solution for remote access and data transmission to and from connected machines. In addition, the company offers gateways that acts as translators between air-conditioning units, thermostats, lighting ballasts, etc., as well as building management systems. Further, it provides connectivity solution for machines and development of hardware, software, and associated services; smart grid solutions for industrial, energy, and railway power systems; solutions for easy implementation of safety communication; and test tools and hardware for use in test benches during development and for troubleshooting. Additionally, the company offers software, which is used for displaying machine information online; and hardware and software that measures, signalizes, and connects various parts of an installation and ensure that it operates effectively. It serves device manufacturers, machine builders, system integrators, and end users. HMS Networks AB (publ) was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Halmstad, Sweden.

HTRO.ST.summary: Hexatronic Group AB (publ), together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, markets, and sells fiber optic communication solutions in Sweden and internationally. The company supplies passive infrastructure for telecom companies; and provides components and system solutions. It also offers fiber optic cables, ducts, copper cables, and network accessories; high tech products for fiber optic communications; fiber optic solutions, such as prefabricated ODFs, multi-fiber cable assemblies, and industrial applications; and training services for telecommunications, electric/gas, and health/safety markets. In addition, the company provides high density polyethylene pipes for communication, power, fiber-to-the-home, ITS, CATV, geothermal, and industrial pressure pipe applications; develops and certificates programs for various industries; and apprenticeships and specialist training programs, as well as distributes fiber optic fusion splicing and measuring equipment. It serves telecom companies and operators, communications, defense and mining industries, and network owners. Hexatronic Group AB (publ) was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden.

ICQ.F.summary: Invisio AB (publ) develops and sells personal communication and hearing protection systems for professionals in the defense and military, law enforcement, and security sectors in Sweden, rest of Europe, North America, and internationally. The company offers headsets, control units, intercom systems, accessories and remote push-to-talk units, and cables. Its products are used in high noise and hearing protection applications. Invisio AB (publ) markets and sells its products through partners and resellers. The company was formerly known as INVISIO Communications AB (publ) and changed its name to Invisio AB (publ) in June 2010. Invisio AB (publ) was founded in 1999 and is based in MalmÃ¶, Sweden.

INCOAX.ST.summary: InCoax Networks AB (publ) provides networking products and solutions to telecom and broadband, and hospitality sectors. It offers modems; in:xtnd Access for the implementation, control, and monitoring of coaxial link conditions; and in:xtnd Manage, an advanced network management system. The company also provides control units under in:xtnd Control name, and frequency combiners under in:xtnd Combine name. InCoax Networks AB (publ)was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in GÃ¤vle, Sweden.

IVSO.ST.summary: Invisio AB (publ) develops and sells personal communication and hearing protection systems for professionals in the defense and military, law enforcement, and security sectors in Sweden, rest of Europe, North America, and internationally. The company offers headsets, control units, intercom systems, accessories and remote push-to-talk units, and cables. Its products are used in high noise and hearing protection applications. Invisio AB (publ) markets and sells its products through partners and resellers. The company was formerly known as INVISIO Communications AB (publ) and changed its name to Invisio AB (publ) in June 2010. Invisio AB (publ) was founded in 1999 and is based in MalmÃ¶, Sweden.

KEBNI-B.ST.summary: KebNi AB (publ) develops, manufactures, markets, and sells 4-axes stabilizing VSAT antennas for maritime applications under the KebNi Maritime brand. It also provides inertial sensor systems for measuring movements in three dimensions; and communication on the move (COTM) antennas for land and mobile satellite communications systems. The company was formerly known as Advanced Stabilized Technologies Group AB (publ) and changed its name to KebNi AB (publ) in July 2020. KebNi AB (publ) is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

KEN.F.summary: KebNi AB (publ) develops, manufactures, markets, and sells 4-axes stabilizing VSAT antennas for maritime applications under the KebNi Maritime brand. It also provides inertial sensor systems for measuring movements in three dimensions; and communication on the move (COTM) antennas for land and mobile satellite communications systems. The company was formerly known as Advanced Stabilized Technologies Group AB (publ) and changed its name to KebNi AB (publ) in July 2020. KebNi AB (publ) is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

NETI-B.ST.summary: Net Insight AB (publ) offers media network and resource optimization solutions worldwide. It operates through Media Networks and Resources Optimization segments. It offers professional media transport solutions, including remote production, customer provisioned networks, live contribution, internet media transport, ATSC 3.0 transport, cloud ingest, and affiliate interconnect and distribution under the Nimbra name, as well as live IP media function virtualization solutions under the Aperi name. The company also provides support, training, and professional services. Net Insight AB (publ) sells its products and services through its sales force and network partner. It serves broadcasters, digital service providers, content owners, and production companies. Net Insight AB (publ) was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Solna, Sweden.

NOBC.F.summary: Strax AB (publ) designs, develops, manufactures, and sells mobile accessories worldwide. It offers a range of protection, power, and audio products, as well as connected devices. The company provides its products under proprietary brands, such as XQISIT, Urbanista, and THOR GLASS, as well as under licensed brands comprising Adidas and Bugatti; and business-to-business POS solutions and business-to-consumer online shopping options. The company provides its products through telecom operators, mass merchants, and consumer electronics and lifestyle retailers, as well as directly through online. Strax AB has collaboration with 4ocean to support the development and manufacturing of 4ocean signature iPhone cases. Strax AB (publ) was founded in 1995 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

NSGB.F.summary: Net Insight AB (publ) offers media network and resource optimization solutions worldwide. It operates through Media Networks and Resources Optimization segments. It offers professional media transport solutions, including remote production, customer provisioned networks, live contribution, internet media transport, ATSC 3.0 transport, cloud ingest, and affiliate interconnect and distribution under the Nimbra name, as well as live IP media function virtualization solutions under the Aperi name. The company also provides support, training, and professional services. Net Insight AB (publ) sells its products and services through its sales force and network partner. It serves broadcasters, digital service providers, content owners, and production companies. Net Insight AB (publ) was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Solna, Sweden.

STRAX.ST.summary: Strax AB (publ) designs, develops, manufactures, and sells mobile accessories worldwide. It offers a range of protection, power, and audio products, as well as connected devices. The company provides its products under proprietary brands, such as XQISIT, Urbanista, and THOR GLASS, as well as under licensed brands comprising Adidas and Bugatti; and business-to-business POS solutions and business-to-consumer online shopping options. The company provides its products through telecom operators, mass merchants, and consumer electronics and lifestyle retailers, as well as directly through online. Strax AB has collaboration with 4ocean to support the development and manufacturing of 4ocean signature iPhone cases. Strax AB (publ) was founded in 1995 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

TAGM-B.ST.summary: TagMaster AB (publ), a technology company, develops and sells advanced sensor systems and solutions based on radio, radar, magnetic and camera technologies under the TagMaster, CitySync, Balogh, CA Traffic, Magsys, Hikob, and Sensys Networks brand names. The company develops and markets radio frequency identification products for traffic and rail applications; and automatic number plate recognition products. Its products are used in parking and access control, security, traffic, tolling, airport, mining and port, and fleet operation areas. The company exports its products primarily to Europe, the Middle East, Asia, and North America through a network of partners, and systems integrators. TagMaster AB (publ) was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Kista, Sweden.

TCT.F.summary: TCECUR Sweden AB (publ), through its subsidiaries, develops, installs, operates, and sells security systems and secure communication solutions in Europe. The company offers critical security systems in speech, data, and image; radio systems; access control systems, alarm systems, camera surveillance, and visitor management systems; and burglary and fire alarms. It serves public sector, real estate, and construction companies. The company was formerly known as TC Connect AB (publ) and changed its name to TCECUR Sweden AB (publ) in June 2018. TCECUR Sweden AB (publ) was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Kista, Sweden.

WAYS.ST.summary: Waystream Holding AB (publ) provides a portfolio of service routers and switches that are used in the areas of high speed broadband service networks. The company offers Ethernet and IP/MPLS network routers; gigabit Ethernet L2+ access switches; and layer 3 gigabit Ethernet access switches, as well as optical accessories. It also provides technical support, training, and professional services. In addition, the company offers various solutions, such as fiber fidelity, IPTV monitoring, software defined networking and fiber to the home, MPC scenarios, pay-as-you-grow, broadband network gateway, and point-to-point technology solutions. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Kista, Sweden.
